website_summaries.verdict: This is an excellent yoga mat that is well worth the high-end price thanks to Gurus' focus on quality construction and emphasis on the environment.
pros: Made from natural cork and rubber materials
Company plants a tree for every product sold

customer_reviews.title: Started peeling/falling apart 15 minutes into class
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed. Love the philosophy of the company (sustainability, etc.). So I splurged and order the higher end mat. The stickiness was GREAT with a bit of water, rolled out and stayed perfectly ... but within 15 minutes of my yoga class of my first (and only) time using it - the cork on the mat started molting and peeling. By the end of class the mat was shedding and I had cork fragments all over me. Bummed - had really hoped this would work out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grippy Firm and Comfy: great mat for warm classes!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and firm so my knees love it even in contorted poses or sitting in full-lotus while boosted up, but also solid enough that your foot doesn't wobble on one-footed balance poses. The cork is fairly smooth but gets grippier as your pores open up in a warm class. In shavasana, it's nice to be laying on something that's all natural and yet comfortable. Pros: - Comfort: firm yet forgiving on joins - Balance: absorbs sweat and isn't squishy do dancing-shiva feels good - Look: It just looks cooler to have cork mat than some rubbery-behemoth Cons: - Weight/Size: Great for everyday yoga, not air-travel.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Professional

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well; no smell, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that it can be a bit slick. Works great as soon as I start to work up a bit of sweat, but I really have to grip hard at the beginning of a yoga session. Would be EXCELLENT for anyone who sweats a lot, but I lightly perspire at best, so it's an effort to hold on sometimes. But very comfortable and cushiony, while still stable, and just pleasant to use. LOVE that it has no nasty latex scent to it, and is as supportive/solid as a Lulu Lemon mat (without the smell).
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for studio and home practice
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Gurus mat, having purchased one of the originals, and I am very happy with the purchase so far! Thicker and superior rubber, and non-stick surface makes it ideal for hot yoga - I live in the country so am not able to get to the studio as much as I would like, so enjoy flipping it over and getting on my mat when I can, meaning I get to stay calm and fit (relatively speaking;)) in between family and work!
customer_reviews.author: Someone in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this mat in the mail. Not only did I receive it within a day of ordering it, but I also got to use it right away! The cushion is amazing. The cork provides such a nice balance of durability, strength and a bit of give for comfort. The cork is naturally non stick so I had no problem switching in and out of poses without slipping or sliding around. Thankfully no chemically gross new plastic smell eminating from the mat when I first rolled it out either! And I love the message at the top as a constant reminder of why I'm on the mat. Awesome job gurus!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Browning

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gurus Product yet!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Gurus product so far! I had been using the old Gurus’ cork mat and finally bought the new one. I love everything about the new features. It’s much lighter and more flexible. Even better grip and cushion than before. Have tried it out both in my home and outside and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this mat for two years and, while I don’t do yoga daily, it has gotten some use. I bought it because the mat I had was always slippery from clammy hands during sessions and my yoga studio had cork floors that were awesome. It made all the difference in being able to hold poses. This mat is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: The Book Nook

customer_reviews.title: CORK PEELED OFF DURING FIRST USE! SLIPPED ALL OVER!
customer_reviews.text: TLDR: Awful. Avoid, avoid, avoid. The cork on this mat is literally paper thin. Within the first 45 min of a hot vinyasa class, it was peeling off in chunks. I bought this mat for the anti-slip factor that I've heard praised. Well I slipped much more on this thing than on foam or rubber mats (Lululemon, Gaiam, Manduka). And I slipped to the point where it was dangerous. From half-moon to warrior 2, my back foot slid out. I was stunned how horrible this thing was and immediately initiated a refund. Also, just FYI, while posting this review, I was notified that there are an unusual number of suspicious reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Johm Trumpets

customer_reviews.title: Love Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is everything i wanted. Perfect for kundiini or Hot Yoga, plenty of padding for my knees and i don't have to drag a towel along. Love the fact that it's sustainable, AND I dont have to smell chemicals! AND AND easy to wipe down after practice with NO chemicals : ) Thank YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tee L

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this a few days ago and absolutely love it! Used it to stretch after a run
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few days ago and absolutely love it! Used it to stretch after a run, and to do a little yoga. The mat is just the right thickness, comfortable, and you won’t slip/slide! Even with sweaty feet and hands, I stayed put. Used both inside on carpet and outside on concrete. Highly recommend! Even my pup liked it!! The material doesn’t feel cheap or likely to fall apart. Excited for the many, many uses in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, smells good, looks good, and really helps me keep steady during practice. It feels solid. The cork isn't super thick so I worry it might wear over time but haven't seen any evidence of that yet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: You won't go back to a rubber mat
customer_reviews.text: Once you step on this mat you will immediately feel the difference in quality compared to tradition rubber or vinyl yoga mats. The cork surface has a really nice premium feel and great traction. It really does make the ordinary yoga mat feel cheap. I'm also really impressed with the build quality and esthetics of this mat, it reminded me of an Apple product when I opened the box. Its's always a win to get such a nice product that is eco friendly. Good job Gurus!
customer_reviews.author: Shiv Takhar

customer_reviews.title: It's different and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I've had it four months and have used it 3 times a week for a couple hours. It is heavy and a bit cumbersome. In the first few weeks some of the bamboo surface wore off but it seems stable now. The upside of the weight and rubber bottom is that it does not move during practice. The potential downside is that it takes more time to position/reposition. I admit that it took a month or more before I decided I liked it. It's different, but it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Goan

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best yoga mat I’ve ever owned. True to its description, the wetter the mat gets, the gripper it gets. The natural cork top of the mat provides superior grip as compared to other mats I’ve used. The rubber bottom provides excellent comfort and grip the floor; it’d recommend it to anyone, but particularly those who have joint pain, it “lightens the load” so to speak on your wrists and knees. Incomparable durability, and very easy to keep clean. 5 star yoga mat!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Solid good mat
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat, it's very cushiony, yet firm and has a wonderful scent, but I wish it was less slippery. It's not bad, but certainly not great. I have read that it gets less slippery with use and when wet. What you also need to know is that it is very thick and heavy. I keep mine in my car, so for me it's not bad, but I can't see taking it for long walks or on public transportation. It seems to be well made and I expect it to last a long time. I would give it 3.5.
customer_reviews.author: Awilda N

customer_reviews.title: Doubtful
customer_reviews.text: Loved this may but tends to be very slippery and heavy. I have to spray water on it to prevent slipping from yoga poses.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Love it! Bit expensive compare to other yoga mats, but it is worth it. Absolutely “no sliding hands” during the yoga poses.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: I took this mat to hot yoga and it was amazing! I love the cork material (even though I was sweaty, it was slip proof). The function of the mat is top notch but the style doesn’t hurt either. I would highly recommend this mat to beginners (like me, but I’m getting there) and advanced yogis. Great purchase, totally worth the $$, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonni K

customer_reviews.title: This mat is amazing, especially when wet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cork mat from Guru! It's very comfortable to practice on and has excellent grip, especially when it's wet, so it would be great for hot yoga. Really cushiony too so I enjoy doing my yin practices on it as well. I love the ethics of the company and I feel like I am doing good for the world because Guru plants a tree every time you purchase a mat! 10 of 10 I'd recommend this :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slide when you sweat, eco friendly, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat for meditation and movement. It’s extremly comfy and soft on my joints. It’s hard for me to find yoga mats that I really connect with because they’re usually uncomfortable, break easily, or slip when I sweat which is so bad for your joints. When I sweat on this mat it actually sticks even better! The mat grips to my hands and allows for a nice sweaty practice. I also love that it’s eco friendly and super stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: the mat is a little curled up still going into week 2 of purchase but never had a weird smell. The mat is pretty heavy but it’s definitely not going anywhere. I researched for awhile debating and it’s definitely worth the purchase price. We shall see how it lasts a year or two down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zero sliding, excellent grip, not
customer_reviews.text: I got this particular may because I wanted something that could be used on carpet as well as hard wood floors. It does not have a ton of padding so it’s a little uncomfortable when you do abs or kneel. Again, it satisfied exactly wht I was looking for and these are just small complaints!
customer_reviews.author: khmog

customer_reviews.title: Not great - there are better cork mats
customer_reviews.text: This mat shedded half the cork in the 1 hour of yoga I did! The print on the top also left an imprint on my head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all styles of yoga
customer_reviews.text: I've had the mat for a few weeks now and have used it in my varied practice. From gentle flow, through warm vinyasa, I have been really happy with this mat. It has great grip in a sweaty environment and provides a comfortable base for floor work. No slipping and no extra cushioning needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schick

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening I felt disappointed at the lack grip as the whole reason I got this was my synthetic map didn't have grip at all. However upon using it consistently it broke in and feels better than any mat I have used so far. Extremely satisfied with the mat. It's beautiful and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Strong & stable yoga mat that cleans easy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally went for the cork mat and I LOVE it. Gurus did such a great job - I feel so strong on this mat!! It doesn't have a synthetic rubber smell, and is very easy to clean which are a couple things I was worried about with the purchase of this mat. I loved my mat so much, I bought one for my sister for her birthday too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful yoga mat. It is super grippy both with dry hands and with sweaty hands and does not slide on the floor. It provides good support for the back and knees and does not smell, even though one side is rubber. Easy to clean. I would say the only negative is that it is heavy, but not any heavier than the thicker rubber mats. It really is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot yoga!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat with a great bonus. A tree is planted for each sale which is awesome. The mat itself is quick to dry and requires little maintenance and odor is not an issue. And no matter how much you sweat, you will not slip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this mat overall
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but very comfortable. Still doesn't want to lay flat after 6 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Burt May

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves It
customer_reviews.text: She said its wonderful not slipping around during hot yoga thanks to this mat. Its also for a great cause anytime you can positively impact the environment.
customer_reviews.author: ralph parrett

customer_reviews.title: The Tesla of Yoga Mats - A MUST purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga mat is amazing!! I go to hot yoga, so there is a lot of sweat during class :) Gurus is sturdy so I did not slip, but also soft and luxurious, which helped each pose!! Definitely recommend this :D
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: When you do hot yoga the water stays on the mat so when you lay on it your back gets wet
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: good cushion
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this yoga mat a 3 because my hands will slip while using it. It has good cushion but I dont like that I still slip while using.
customer_reviews.author: H. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Can Hold Up to Frequent, Rigorous, Sweaty Practice
customer_reviews.text: A few months in and the slip is still better than any other mat I have had. Will continue to update. Still 5-6 day a week ashtanga practice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The cork layer started to come out. Very bad product for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar Kunal

customer_reviews.title: The mat is advertised as sustainable while packaged in plastic-disappointing. And it was cracked!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the crack and the plastic wrapping, the mat has good cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mat, comfortable, non-slip. Happy with my purchase, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sircar

customer_reviews.title: Loveliest Mat Ever
customer_reviews.text: Loveliest mat I have ever owned! It passed the full wheel test worth out any slippage : )
customer_reviews.author: Geniren

customer_reviews.title: Never buy a traditional mat and towel again :)
customer_reviews.text: This is the best yoga mat I have ever used- bar none! I have been a loyal customer ever since their kickstarter launch years ago. I had a problem with my first mat when it started peeling and they replaced it right away and have been nothing but amazing since! I use it every day, the durability is fantastic- they have 2-3 years of life in them. The mat is grippy for hot yoga and both sides can be used. A recommend spraying with water or a water/essential oil fusion the first time to prevent cracking, and cleaning with essential oils and water (I use a hose) after every few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Howell

customer_reviews.title: Super great quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mat to be delivered to my work because my apartment isn’t always easy to get into. Unbeknownst to me, my bosses and coworker opened up this bad boy and tested it for me when it arrived. They had a lot of fun obviously but told me how good quality it was. Since then, I’ve used it and love it. The mat itself is pretty thick and doesn’t move at all while you’re working through your practice. It rolls up easily and is super quick to clean if you’re kinda sweaty or the floor isn’t the cleanest. I’d definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Roots Mat Will Keep You Rooted!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Roots mat! It's well made, stable, and so easy on the joints. I also use it for running in place, and my bones immediately said thank you. So it's great for yoga as well as other fitness activities. It's a great size for yoga and will help prevent slipping. My mat has flaked off some cork, but that probably is how it goes. Highly recommended! I'm wearing Gurus flip-flops too!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Sprout for 3 months now, and use it about 3 times weekly. I love everything about it! The cork feels amazing under my hands and feet, and I never slide. It did roll a bit in the beginning, but I just laid it flat with some heavy books on the ends for a few days and it has been fine since. I have never been disappointed by this brand. Both their yoga products and sandals have exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability in one product.
customer_reviews.text: This a high quality product that adds comfort and stability to my yoga routine. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: David Kar

customer_reviews.title: Do you like to sweat it out on the mat? This is the mat for you!
customer_reviews.text: I own both the Roots Premium Cork Yoga Mat and the Sprout Travel Mat and I don’t go anywhere without them! As yogi who loves to sweat it out, these mats are life savers when it comes to stability, durability, and comfort. No slipping and sliding! When I’m on my Guru mat, I feel grounded, supported, and powerful. From the first time I stepped on this mat, I never looked back. It’s the best!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Russ

customer_reviews.title: The cork comes off after about 6 months of using 3x a week
customer_reviews.text: So, I do love that I don't have to have a towel and do not slip BUT I have a cork bald spot where my feet are...so I turned it around..but now it is flaking off again...for $$$$ it has only lasted 6 months and I need a new one..
customer_reviews.author: Allison  Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite yoga mat. Lightweight yet durable. Definitely stands out in class and I get compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Natural and Extremely Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cork mat for the last few years and honestly couldn’t imagine using a different mat. It provides a sense of earthy feel as my body connects to it through my practice. I love that I can practice in the rain, take it in a hot yoga studio or just flow at home. It’s an all around very durable and multi purpose mat which works extremely well for me as a yoga practioner. I highly recommend having this mat within reach for any style of yoga you practice.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many reasons...
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga mat for so many reasons: 1) made using sustainable materials 2) lightweight 3) perfect thickness to cushion my knees 4) super grippy side for sweaty sessions 5) the cork is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Galloway

customer_reviews.title: NOT CORK
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MOSTLY RUBBER WITH ONLY AN OUTER CORK LAYER. RUBBER IS PLASTIC AND NOT SUSTAINABLE. RETURNING. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: melanie krakower

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a yoga teacher and received this mat as a gift. It's become my mat for home practice as my studio mat is manduka. I love how lightweight it is in comparison to my studio mat, it's also very VERY comfortable. Great padding for wrist and knee support. Good mat. Good people.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Alfaro

product_meta.title: Cork Yoga Mat with Natural Rubber Bottom, Roots Eco Friendly Yoga Mat, Non Slip Yoga Cork Mat, 72x25 Inches - Gurus
feature_bullets: NATURAL AND SUSTAINABLE – Gurus’ Sprout Natural Luxury Yoga Mat is 4mm thick and is made from high-quality lightweight cork top and TPE back. The supportive layer of cork keeps you free from toxic materials, so it’s safe to use for daily practice. The cork also keeps your mat odor free without using cleaners.

NON SLIP AND WATERPROOF – Cork naturally displaces moisture and gets grippier when wet, so you don’t have the same slipping issue you have with other mats. Our Slip Resistant Yoga mat performs better when wet, so you may need to sprinkle some water on it when dry. Even during a sweat inducing practice, this mat works perfectly without a towel.

IMPROVES YOGA PRACTICE – Our 72x25-inch premium yoga mat is perfect for on-the-go practitioners and travelers. We’ve removed all the latex from the Sprout Yoga Mat to make it lighter, only about 2 lbs and more comfortable to travel with. Take it with you anywhere – Pilates practice, CrossFit, or to the park.

GREAT FOR INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE – The cork layer of the Gurus Sprout soft yoga mat does not absorb heat the way rubber and foam mats do, making this mat ideal for outdoor practice. It’s also convenient since the mat rolls super tight for travel. The eco friendly, textured TPE back grips almost any surface so you can practice Bikram and general fitness exercises outside the studio.

GURUS GIVES BACK – We have teamed up with Trees for The Future, a non profit that plants trees with rural communities in the developing world, to plant a tree for every Gurus product purchased. This ensures that every sturdy yoga mat, sandals, etc. made gives back to the natural resources that helped create it.
